description: This file is a build script for the 'rdklogger' component, used within a larger software project. It sets environment variables for cross-compilation, provides utility functions for configuring, cleaning, building, and installing the project, and handles command-line arguments to perform these actions.

methods.name: usage
methods.description: Displays usage information for the script.

methods.name: configure
methods.description: Sets up the build environment by generating configuration files using autoconf and related tools.

methods.name: clean
methods.description: Removes build artifacts and cleans up the source directory.

methods.name: rebuild
methods.description: Performs clean followed by configure and build.

methods.name: install
methods.description: Copies necessary files and installs the built project into the target directory.
